properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 4:13AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Occasional freezing rain. Ice accumulations of up to a
quarter inch.

* WHERE...Jefferson county, particularly from Watertown north to
the Thousand Islands region.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
properties.instruction:
Occasional freezing rain will result in slippery roads and
limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving.

Submit ice reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
